verses.roman:
yāre dekhe tāre kahe,--'kaha kṛṣṇa-nāma'
tāṅhāra darśane loka haya premoddāma

synonyms: yāre dekhe—to whomever he saw; tāre kahe—he addresses him; kaha kṛṣṇa-nāma—my dear friend, chant Kṛṣṇa's holy name; tāṅhāra darśane—by seeing him; loka haya—people became; prema-uddāma—highly elevated in love of Godhead.
translation: He advised whomever he met to chant the holy names Hare Kṛṣṇa. Thus upon seeing him, people were overwhelmed with love of Godhead.
